name: Metalfoes Counter
effectText: If a card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Special Summon 1 "Metalfoes" monster from your Deck. During either player's turn, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 face-up "Metalfoes" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand.
